42688781975739.name: Assorted Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Jar
42688781975739.desc: Why settle for one flavor of rock candy when you can have them all?! Our assorted crystal sticks tub gives you a little bit of everything so you never have to settle. Each includes a disposable wooden stick and a generous helping of gorgeous sugar crystals. They come individually wrapped so each stick stays fresh and ready to eat. Give guests something sweet to enjoy with our assorted rock candy crystal sticks!

42688594051259.name: White Rock Candy Swizzle Sticks - 72ct
42688594051259.desc: Bippidee, Boppidee, Boo! You'll feel like you're waving a magic wand every time you pick up one of these glamorous, sparkly White Rock Candy Swizzle Sticks. Treat your little princesses to a magical birthday party, keep these around the house to stir into drinks that need extra sweetening, or bring them to a party to add an extra dash of sparkly pizazz. Since only the purest form of sugar can make it through the crystallization process, these rock candies uphold the top quality standard of the finest diamonds. And they definitely look the part! Wow your eyes and taste buds with these beautiful crystals today.

42688706281659.name: Chocolate Rocks - 5lb
42688706281659.desc: Rocks aren't normally very appetizing, unless they are chocolate rocks! These natural looking candies are absolutely gorgeous to see and so sweet to the taste buds. If you love cocoa flavor, then you will fall in love with these charming little edible pebbles. Each includes a dense chocolate candy that's covered in a solid candy coating in a rainbow of earthy colors!What makes chocolate rocks so delicious isn't just their taste, but also their appearance. Each stone looks just like the real thing! The candy coating creates lovely texture while each chocolate is uniquely shaped √ê just like real rocks. This assortment includes a variety of hues, ranging from slate blue to burnt orange and black. Grab a handful or enjoy one at a time. No matter which color you choose, each offers the same amazing chocolate taste. Our bulk chocolate rocks are a must-have for cake decorating and special occasions!

42688780173499.name: Pop Rocks Cherry Candy Packs - 24ct Box
42688780173499.desc: Pop Rocks cherry candy is an exciting treat that will take you back in time! This is the original flavor that made this confection so popular. Each box contains an assortment of individual packets. Tear one open and pour onto your tongue to discover the fizzy, tingly sensation that accompanies the famous pop and crackle of this one-of-a-kind confection. Our bulk cherry Pop Rocks pack makes a great filler for party favors and more!

42688781779131.name: Red Rock Candy Crystal Sticks Strawberry - 36ct Tub
42688781779131.desc: Red rock candy sticks are packed with fruit flavor! This delicious confection is one of the most eye-catching confections you'll put in your mouth. Each includes a disposable wooden handle that looks elegant and offers a sturdy way to hold your treat. The top is covered in dazzling red sugar crystals with an irresistible strawberry flavor. Our bulk rock candy pack contains many individually wrapped pieces for parties, picnics, and showers.

42688814153915.name: Blue Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Jar
42688814153915.desc: Beautiful blue raspberry rock candy sticks are loads of fun and very versatile.

42688678559931.name: Rock Candy Swizzle Sticks 72ct - Assorted Colors
42688678559931.desc: Crystals begin their complex formation in a process called, nucleation. From there, they synchronize to build impressive structures that make us ''ooh and aah. '' But we'll drop the scientific mumbo-jumbo and just get right down to what these assorted rock candies are: delicious. Deep within all of their crags, lies sweet, fruity flavor that every candy fan with love. A longtime staple in gift shops, patrons have been gobbling up these tasty wonders with smiles on their faces for years and years. Give your kids a lesson in science and good taste today with these edible crystals. Just try to take a second to marvel at their majesty before you devour them.

42688781320379.name: Pink Rock Candy Crystal Sticks Cherry - 36ct Tubs
42688781320379.desc: Cherry rock candy is both a tasty treat and a beautiful work of natural art! Each serving comes in a wooden stick with a round end. The top includes a thick layer of gorgeous pink sugar crystals. They form facets and angles that add a hint of sparkle. Remove the clear plastic wrapper and enjoy sweet cherry flavor! Our bulk rock candy sticks are a must-have for showers, weddings, parties, and more!

42688780730555.name: Pop Rocks Blue Raspberry Candy Packs - 24ct Box
42688780730555.desc: Blue raspberry Pop Rocks offer yet another tasty take on this one-of-a-kind retro candy! Take an envelope and open it up to discover a collection of tiny crystal pieces. Place on the tongue and let the fun begin! You get the sweet taste of blue raspberry followed by the intense popping and crackling that makes this confection so memorable. Rediscover an old favorite with our bulk Pop Rocks blue raspberry candy!

42689950646459.name: Rock Candy Strings - 5lb Dryden & Palmer
42689950646459.desc: If you love sugar, then you must try rock candy strings! This fun and festive confection is as sweet as it gets. Rock candy is literally crystallized sugar so there are no impurities. Each strand comes in brilliant colors that reveal its irresistible flavor. Try sunny lemon, vibrant orange, pretty pink cotton candy, tantalizing red cherry and many more! A total of 10 unique flavors are available so you can pick out your favorites or purchase a combination so there's something for every sweet tooth!Our rock candy is convenient to share and enjoy. Each is attached to a length of string so it's flexible and easy to maneuver when licking or biting. All sides feature dazzling crystals that shine like sugary diamonds. Give as a special party favor at birthdays or tempt guests at picnics and holiday gatherings. Everyone will love having their own string of sparkling rock candy in any of our fabulous flavors!

42688782172347.name: Light Blue Rock Candy Crystal Sticks Cotton Candy - 36ct Jar
42688782172347.desc: Light blue rock candy sticks offer a unique flavor that everyone will love. This tasty confection includes beautiful blue sugar crystals that are formed around a handsome wooden stick. Treat your taste buds to the sweet flavor of cotton candy in every bite! Each facet produces a delightful sparkle that looks gorgeous on tables and in candy jars. Enjoy this classic confection in your favorite flavor with our bulk rock candy sticks!

42688813891771.name: White Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Tubs

42688781549755.name: Green Apple Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Jar
42688781549755.desc: Green apple rock candy sticks will satisfy cravings while tempting the eyes with the gorgeous sparkle of sugar crystals! This beloved confection starts with a wooden stick. A layer of green crystals form along the top half, creating a wider tip that looks amazing. Take a bite and enjoy a combination of sugar and fruit. Our green apple crystal sticks are a great way to get more green into your decor for parties, weddings, showers, and other events.

42690274459835.name: Rock Candy On A Stick Navy Blue Blueberry Espeez - 36ct
42690274459835.desc: Espeez Rock Candy On A Stick Navy Blue Blueberry Tub 0.8oz - 36ct

42688779911355.name: Pop Rocks Cotton Candy Candy Packs - 24ct Box
42688779911355.desc: Pop Rocks is the candy that explodes in your mouth! Our collection includes one of the sweetest flavors you will ever taste: cotton candy! Each packet contains a generous helping of crystal pieces. Pour directly on your tongue to enjoy the great cotton candy taste along with the tingle and pop that makes this confection so popular. Our bulk Pop Rocks cotton candy pack is a must-have for parties!

42690274328763.name: Rock Candy On A Stick Lavender Tutti Frutti Espeez - 36ct
42690274328763.desc: Espeez Rock Candy On A Stick Lavender Tutti Frutti Tub 0.8oz - 36ct

42688783679675.name: Yellow Rock Candy Crystal Sticks Banana - 36ct Tub
42688783679675.desc: When it comes to rock candy, we have all your favorite fruit flavors - including banana! Each piece includes a traditional wooden stick that helps keep your hands clean while you snack. The top half is covered in layers of gorgeous yellow sugar crystals. The faceted shape and smooth texture add a fun sparkle that is irresistible! Our bulk rock candy sticks are a must-have for parties, picnics, showers, and weddings.

42688814514363.name: Purple Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Tubs
42688814514363.desc: Purple rock candy sticks from Espeez! Gorgeous purple rock candy on a stick!

42690274295995.name: Rock Candy On A Stick Gold Espeez - 36ct
42690274295995.desc: Espeez Rock Candy On A Stick Gold Tub 0.8oz - 36ct

42688780927163.name: Pop Rocks Grape Candy Packs - 24ct Box
42688780927163.desc: Grape Pop Rocks are just one more reason to try this irresistible confection! There's lots of grape candy in the world, but none offer the same snacking experience as Pop Rocks. Open up the packet, pour this retro candy crystals on your tongue then wait for the excitement to begin. You get a burst of sweet grape flavor immediately followed by pops and crackles across your tongue.

42690274394299.name: Rock Candy On A Stick Brown Root Beer Espeez - 36ct
42690274394299.desc: Espeez Rock Candy On A Stick Brown Root Beer 0.8oz Tub - 36ct

42688783909051.name: Black Cherry Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Jar
42688783909051.desc: Black cherry rock candy sticks are one of the boldest and most beautiful treats you can eat. The confection consists of pure sugar crystals that gather on top of a classic wooden stick. The handle is convenient to keep your hands clean and looks gorgeous in a glass jar. This version comes in dark crystals that complement the sweet black cherry flavor. Enjoy alone or combine with any of our other bulk rock candy stick tubs!

42688706838715.name: Choco Rocks Boulders - 5lb
42688706838715.desc: You've heard of Choco Rocks, but what about Choco Boulders? These delicious candies offer tons of sweetness in a beautiful, edible rock. What makes Choco Rocks so fascinating is the way they recreate the look and shape of real stones. If you want to add more variety to your cake decorating or candy making collection, this is a must-have ingredient! Sprinkle Choco Rocks on cookies, cakes and more and make guests think they are about to bite into real pebbles! Children absolutely love these chocolate rocks when used on construction themed cakes or cupcakes. You can keep things simple by pouring a handful into a bag or box to give away as a unique party or wedding favor. Our bulk Choco Boulders contains a vibrant mix of styles, ranging from shimmering silver to sandstone and gold tones. Each piece includes that same realistic texture and rich chocolate flavor that makes Choco Rocks so yummy!

42690274427067.name: Rock Candy On A Stick Silver Espeez - 36ct
42690274427067.desc: Espeez Rock Candy On A Stick Silver Tub 0.8oz - 36ct

42688784105659.name: Light Green Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Jar
42688784105659.desc: Light green rock candy crystal sticks are an easy way to make your dessert table sparkle! This beloved treat includes a disposable wooden stick that supports a generous helping of sugar crystals. Each is light green, just like the highlights on a watermelon rind! Enjoy the summery taste of sweet melon in every bite. Our bulk light green rock candy sticks are perfect for parties, weddings, showers, and picnics!

42688567247035.name: Pop Rocks Bubble Gum - 24ct
42688567247035.desc: The countdown to detonation has begun! The moment you open these Pop Rocks Bubble Gum candy packets and lift them to your mouth, you'll have 3. . 2. . 1. . . seconds until they explode on your tongue!However, don't fret too much. Once you survive the blast of the bursting rocks, you'll be able to chew down on delicious bubble gum. We call that a delicious calm after the storm and think you will too once you get a taste. Make Halloween for trick-or-treaters even more exciting this year with an order of these classic Pop Rocks. Or make your little ones smile at home by trying these Pop Rocks Bubble Gum for the first time. The choice is yours. Just get ready for fire in the hole!

42689619263675.name: Licorice Rocks - 4.4lb
42689619263675.desc: Licorice Rocks *Not For Sale In California* - 4.4lb

42690015625403.name: Pop Rocks Dips - 18ct
42690015625403.desc: Pop Rocks Dips is a unique treat that's carbonated! If you love the fizzy feeling of soda pop, then you'll love the intense crackle produced by these sweet treats. Original Pop Rocks were introduced in 1975. They literally became a part of pop culture history! No other candy offers a literal explosion in your mouth. Pop Rocks would be the inspiration for other "popping" candies, though none could surpass the original's popularity!Our Pop Rocks Dips includes a colorful box that contains several individual pouches of this crystal-like candy. A lollipop is included and can be dipped in the pouch to make eating even more exciting! Our bulk Pop Rocks Dips give you large quantities that are convenient for birthday parties, holidays and more. Use them as stocking stuffers or hand them out during school activities. Children will love the popping sensation and sound that comes from every mouthful of Pop Rocks Dips!

42688782762171.name: Orange Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 36ct Jar
42688782762171.desc: Orange rock candy sticks will dazzle everyone at snack time! This sweet confection takes a classic treat and gives it a boost of citrus flavor. Each serving includes a wooden stick with bright orange sugar crystals covering the top half. The smooth facets add a delightful sparkle that looks amazing at parties and events. Enjoy your favorite fruit flavor with our orange rock candy crystal sticks!

42688594870459.name: Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 120ct Wrapped
42688594870459.desc: This candy is colorful and exciting. It is fun to eat for children and adults alike. It looks like crystal rock. The taste is sweet and sugary. This candy is great for parties, Halloween, and even stocking stuffers. Some flavors of this great exciting candy included pink cherry, blue raspberry, red strawberry, white natural plain sugar, light blue cotton candy, and even light green watermelon. These candies are also individually wrapped so that they are sure to stay fresh until you are ready to partake. They also come on a convenient stick for your eating extravaganza. Surprise your family and friends with this special treat at your next gathering, as it is sure to bring delight to them. These are even great for companies who are looking for a great item that they can resell in their store. Rock candy sticks look just as great as they taste so you are sure to find pleasure in them!

42688594477243.name: Rock Candy Crystal Sticks - 120ct
42688594477243.desc: Rock candy crystal sticks are an All-American classic favorite. These six-inch long rock sugar treats come on classic wooden sticks for the perfect antique look. You'll feel like you just walked out of the general store when you pick up a bag of these beautiful candies. Flavors include purple grape, pink cherry, light blue cotton candy, light green watermelon, red strawberry, blue raspberry, and white natural plain sugar. There's something for everyone in this classic children's favorite.

42727171588283.desc: Pop Rocks Sour Strawberry Dips Popping Candy - 216ct

42726955057339.name: Pink Cherry Rock Candy Strings - 5lb
42726955057339.desc: Oh, daaaaahling. You'll be the most radiant belle at the ball with a strand of these Pink Cherry Rock Candy Strings. A rich shade of gorgeous pink, these sparkly, and more importantly delicious rock candies are a glamorous and delectable selection for any affair. Since only the purest form of sugar can make it through the crystallization process, these rock candies uphold the top quality standard of the finest diamonds. Add some pizazz to a child's birthday present or keep them around as a fancy treat to give to guests. A bag of these rock candy strings will wow every eater.

42689464172731.name: Assorted Wrapped Rock Candy Sticks Dryden & Palmer - 60ct
42689464172731.desc: Assorted Wrapped Rock Candy Sticks Dryden & Palmer - 60ct

42726957056187.name: White Rock Candy Strings - 5lb
42726957056187.desc: Rock candy is so fun for people of all ages. This great rock candy comes in the color white. When you look at it is can almost seem like it is a diamond, if only it was able to sparkle. Kids love this for their birthday parties and it would look great when used a display for a wedding, decor for the holiday, or even cocktails that you want to embellish. You are sure to find that this hard candy is full of enough sweetness to be able to please your sweet tooth. Each candy varies in length from 2 inches to 6 inches per string. This is just a new version of one of the classic candies that many have been enjoying for years. Now you are sure to find that you love this new white rock candy just as much as you did the other colored rock candy of the past.

42726955909307.name: Strawberry Rock Candy Strings - 5lb
42726955909307.desc: Strawberry Rock Candy Strings may look like rubies, but we assure you that they're even more precious than that! Rock candy strings are clusters of crystalized sugar, colored red for strawberries and packed with a sweet and delicious strawberry flavor.Now you can look glamorous every time you snack with some of these Strawberry Rock Candy Strings and impress your friends and family with your good taste. If you'd like to add something sparkly to Christmas stockings, surprise a loved on for Valentine's Day or have an edible kind of sparkler for the Fourth of July, then this bulk supply of sugar crystal strings are for you!

42688589201595.name: Rock Candy Crystal Sticks Assorted - 60ct Box
42688589201595.desc: We're packing alright. Packing a huge supply of Assorted Rock Candy Crystal Sticks that is! In Pink Cherry, Purple Grape, Red Raspberry, Blue Mint, White Natural, Brown Root Beer, and Lavender Blueberry, there are so many flavors to choose from that you can have a different one every day of the week!These gorgeous rock candy sticks also come in a rainbow of colors of shimmering crystals making them a fun and sophisticated candy for just about any occasion. Order some rainbow rock candy sticks today and you'll be able to give some away as gifts, use some as gorgeous stirrers for unsweetened drinks like tea or lemonade or just enjoy letting them melt in your mouth.

42726952927419.name: Cotton Candy Rock Candy Strings - 5lb
42726952927419.desc: Beautiful crystals, meet a staple of the carnival world, cotton candy! These Cotton Candy Rock Candy Strings will fill you with the joy of the fairgrounds and deliciousness that only cotton candy can provide.Known as cotton candy and candy floss, we just think they should be known as spectacular! Feel like you're laughing at the clowns, taking thrilling rides on the rollercoasters, and listening to the tinkling of carousel music with every bite of these cotton candy crystals. Cotton candy has a history dating back to the 18th century and was first recorded as delighting people in Europe. Machine spun cotton candy as we know it today was developed in 1897.

42688780402875.name: Pop Rocks Green Apple Candy Packs - 24ct Box
42688780402875.desc: Pop Rocks green apple will take your taste buds on a stroll through an exploding orchard! Expand your flavor horizons with the grate taste of this unusual confection. Each package contains a generous quantity of tasty crystals. The party begins as soon as they hit your tongue! Each piece creates a tingly sensation with pops and crackles that make the snacking experience even better. Our bulk green apple Pop Rocks box is a smart choice for kids parties and events.

42726956236987.name: Watermelon Rock Candy Strings - 5lb
42726956236987.desc: The intriguing display of Watermelon Rock Candy Strings will lure everyone in, but it is the mouthwatering flavor that will have everyone caught with their hand in the candy jar. These light green strings of candy are perfect for Christmas and St. Patrick's Day. Throwing a Superman party for kids? Here's your kryptonite! It is not only cool to look at though. True to its name, Watermelon Rock Candy Strings taste just like summer's favorite sweet fruit.Pure sugar gets recrystallized to create rock candy. Since all the impurities are removed during the natural refining process, this is the purest form of sugar you can eat. Watermelon Rock Candy Strings have the ability to satisfy the most intense sweet tooth. This kosher-certified candy is made in the USA and fat-free.
